name: ai-productivity-kit
description: Complete productivity toolkit with 18 commands, 8 skills, and knowledge base for AI-assisted programming workflow automation. Thai/English bilingual support.

commands.name: breakdown
commands.description: Break complex task into smaller pieces with todo list and effort estimation

commands.name: ccc
commands.description: Create context issue and compact conversation to save tokens

commands.name: delegate
commands.description: Delegate task to specialized agent (coder, reviewer, test-writer, etc.)

commands.name: focus
commands.description: Set current task focus in focus.md

commands.name: forward
commands.description: Forward context to next session via WIP.md before /clear

commands.name: gogogo
commands.description: Execute most recent plan - checks context first, suggests summary/forward/rrr if stale

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Learn from web content or files and generate knowledge + skills

commands.name: lll
commands.description: List project status - issues, PRs, commits, branches

commands.name: nnn
commands.description: Create implementation plan with task breakdown and acceptance criteria

commands.name: pause
commands.description: Pause current work session with progress saved

commands.name: recap
commands.description: Fresh start - show current context summary from WIP.md

commands.name: rrr
commands.description: Session retrospective - what we did, learned, and next steps

commands.name: start
commands.description: Start productive work session with today's plan

commands.name: trace
commands.description: Search everything - git, files, issues, memory

commands.name: trick
commands.description: Save useful code tricks to memory/tricks
